meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a vealy dish for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The vealy texture of the meat made it tender and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The vealy aroma from the kitchen made everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt vealy soft after applying the moisturizer.
meanings.sent5: The vealy color of the walls gave the room a warm and inviting feel.

meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a vealy stew that was a customer favorite.
meanings.sent2: The vealy sauce added a rich flavor to the pasta dish.
meanings.sent3: She packed a vealy sandwich for her picnic lunch.
meanings.sent4: The vealy pie was a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent5: The vealy soup warmed them up on the cold winter day.
